paragraphs.text:
%md
## Zeppelin Interpreter Shell `%sh`

* https://zeppelin.apache.org/docs/0.8.0/interpreter/shell.html
* nicht ungefährlich

### Azure (Microsoft)
* https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/hdinsight/spark/apache-spark-zeppelin-notebook
> %sh interpreter will not be supported from HDInsight 4.0 onwards.

msg.data:
Zeppelin Interpreter Shell %sh

  • https://zeppelin.apache.org/docs/0.8.0/interpreter/shell.html
  • nicht ungefährlich

Azure (Microsoft)

  • https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/hdinsight/spark/apache-spark-zeppelin-notebook

    %sh interpreter will not be supported from HDInsight 4.0 onwards.

paragraphs.text:
%sh
echo Hallo welt

date
pwd
whoami
id -a

ls -ls
ls -l /etc/passwd
grep zeppelin /etc/passwd

msg.data:
Hallo welt
Sat Jan 19 13:35:25 UTC 2019
/home/zeppelin
zeppelin
uid=1002(zeppelin) gid=1001(zeppelin) groups=1001(zeppelin)
total 8
1 lrwxrwxrwx  1 zeppelin zeppelin 29 Jan 19 12:00 notebook -> notebook.zep-note-demos-db-01
1 lrwxrwxrwx  1 zeppelin zeppelin 18 Jan 19 12:00 notebook.hortonworks-gallery -> zeppelin-notebooks
1 lrwxrwxrwx  1 zeppelin zeppelin 20 Jan 19 11:59 notebook.zep-note-demos-db-01 -> zep-note-demos-db-01
1 lrwxrwxrwx  1 zeppelin zeppelin 20 Jan 19 11:59 notebook.zep-note-demos-hp-01 -> zep-note-demos-hp-01
1 lrwxrwxrwx  1 zeppelin zeppelin 19 Jan 19 11:59 notebook.zeppelin.apache.org -> zeppelin.apache.org
2 drwxrwxr-x 11 zeppelin zeppelin 11 Jan 19 11:59 zep-note-demos-db-01
2 drwxrwxr-x 21 zeppelin zeppelin 21 Jan 19 11:59 zep-note-demos-hp-01
3 drwxrwxr-x 30 zeppelin zeppelin 32 Jan 19 12:00 zeppelin-notebooks
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 1901 Jan 19 11:59 /etc/passwd
zeppelin:x:1002:1001::/home/zeppelin:/bin/bash

Can't we just buy more IPv4 addresses?



Suggest a new excuse: Tweet to @ipv6excuses
Or play IPv6 Excuse Bingo
